about.title: About ResumePolish AI
about.subtitle: Your AI-powered resume enhancement tool
about.description: ResumePolish is an innovative AI-powered application that helps you create professional, ATS-friendly resumes. Using advanced artificial intelligence, we enhance your resume content, optimize it for applicant tracking systems, and generate personalized cover letters.
about.mission: Our mission is to help you create resumes that stand out to employers and pass through ATS systems. Whether you're looking for your first job or advancing your career, ResumePolish is here to help you present your best professional self.
